content.rendered:
EVENT COORDINATOR

Michelle was born in Johnson City, Tenn. but grew up and attended grade school in Central Wisconsin. She recently moved to Nashville and is so excited to be back in Tennessee!

She attended the University of Wisconsin - Stevens Point where she earned a degree in arts management. Previous to joining Infinity Hospitality, she was the Associate Director for a performing arts center in Wisconsin, where she managed all donor relations and planned large-scale fundraising galas and donor receptions.

Michelle has always had a passion for planning and is looking forward to bringing that passion to events here in Nashville. In her spare time, she enjoys baking, cooking, and finding adventures with her husband and dog.
